osvSchema.details: SQL Injection vulnerability in Employee Management System v.1.0 allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the txtusername and txtpassword parameters in the login.php components.

description_data.value: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2024-1009. Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2024-1009. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2024-1009 instead of this candidate.
